```{r}
# Create data frame of Philippine-made cars and their engines
PH_cars <- data.frame(
  Brand = c("Aurelio", "Sarao Motors", "Toyota PH", "Honda PH", "Mazda PH", "Mitsubishi PH", "Chariot Motors"),
  Model = c("Aurelio Supercar", "Jeepney", "Vios", "City", "3 Sedan", "Mirage G4", "Chariot EV"),
  Engine = c("Mitsubishi 4G63 Turbo", 
             "Diesel Inline-4", 
             "1.3L Dual VVT-i", 
             "1.5L i-VTEC", 
             "1.5L SkyActiv-G", 
             "1.2L MIVEC", 
             "Electric Motor"),
  Type = c("Sports Car", "Utility", "Sedan", "Sedan", "Sedan", "Sedan", "EV"),
  Assembled_in_PH = c(TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE)
)

# View the data frame
print(PH_cars)

# -----------------------------
# Convert the data frame to a matrix
# -----------------------------
PH_cars_matrix <- as.matrix(PH_cars)

# Print the matrix
cat("\nMatrix version:\n")
print(PH_cars_matrix)

# -----------------------------
# Save the data frame to a CSV file
# -----------------------------
write.csv(PH_cars, "PH_cars.csv", row.names = FALSE)

cat("\nCSV file 'PH_cars.csv' has been created in your working directory.\n")

# -----------------------------
# (Optional) Read it back from CSV
# -----------------------------
PH_cars_loaded <- read.csv("PH_cars.csv")

cat("\nLoaded back from CSV:\n")
print(PH_cars_loaded)

```
